item.title: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:11, topic:528695”]You do not need the the npchandler for what you want to do.
Make everything update when you click to teleport in the buttons.

Also in your buttons, you are putting the npc index 533.
I suppose thats the id of aubury, but thats not his index, which makes that the forcedchat will be executed
by the npc on that index. Theres now somewhere on your server another npc yelling the text when you click aubury[/quote]
So basically what he just said is to make it look like this:

	case 553:
		for (int i = 0; i < NPCHandler.maxNPCs; i++) {
			if (NPCHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
                if (NPCHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 553) { // NPC ID
						NPCHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						NPCHandler.npcs[i].forceChat("Senventior Disthine Molenko!");
                    }
                }
			}
		}
	break;

^Not tested.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing

item.title: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

You do not need the the npchandler for what you want to do.
Make everything update when you click to teleport in the buttons.

Also in your buttons, you are putting the npc index 533.
I suppose thats the id of aubury, but thats not his index, which makes that the forcedchat will be executed
by the npc on that index. Theres now somewhere on your server another npc yelling the text when you click aubury

Read full topic

item.title: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:8, topic:528695”] if (c.dialogueAction == 9000) { NPCHandler.npcForceChat = true; c.getPA().startTeleport(2911, 4832, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You've been teleported!"); NPCHandler.npcs[553].forceChat("Senventior Disthine Molenko!"); }

remove the stuff in npchandler

might work might not, i’m not too sure[/quote]
The reason why I’ve had him add code into the the process of npc handler and all that is for the exact issue he is having. It only seems to work when he had the actual check added into his process.
But his process code doesn’t seem to care for the check on the boolean.

OP:
Post your NPCHandlers process() code (all of it) or the entire class. Be sure to use code tags, and if it’s too big, post on pastebin.

Read full topic

item.source: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing

item.title: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

Ok here’s what I have
In ClickingButtons when I click yes to teleport I have…

if (c.dialogueAction == 9000) { NPCHandler.npcForceChat = true; c.getPA().startTeleport(2911, 4832, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You've been teleported!"); } I know I put this in the right place.

In ActionHandler I have it set so it sends the dialogue which has the dialogue actions above when you use the third click option.

In NPCHandler I have if (npcs[i].npcType == 553) { if (npcForceChat = true) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Senventior Disthine Molenko!"); npcForceChat = false; } }

And no errors through the compiler, but when I actually get on the game he’s already shouting it.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing

item.title: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

NPCHandler doesn’t have the variable c defined (Client c).
Also, the way you have it structured, it will only say that text if you’re talking to npc 553 and have that dialogue ID.
Set the dialogue ID in the dialogue answers, and add that check in the clicking buttons. If it’s good on clicking buttons, make it turn a boolean in NPCHandler true, and have your code check if that boolean is true to say your text.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing

item.title: Trying a new way to make Aubury yell how can I fix this small thing
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

I have the dialogue, clicking buttons, and actionhandler set. Just the error coming out of the NPCHandler.

Here’s the code I put in it…

if (npcs[i].npcType == 553) { if (c.dialogueAction == 1024) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Senventior Disthine Molenko!"); } }

Here is the error I get…

[code]source\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2490: error: cannot find symbol

    if (c.dialogueAction == 1024) {

        ^

symbol: variable c
location: class NPCHandler
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic
